title: 1997 - The Year's Best Science Fiction Volume 14
description:
The Year's Best Science Fiction: 14th Annual Collection

Presents 23 of the finest science-fiction works of 1995, including stories by such diverse writers as Michael Bishop, Terry Bisson, Greg Egan, Nancy Kress, Ursula K. Le Guin, Maureen F. McHugh, Mike Resnick, and others.

01) Summation: 1996 by Gardner Dozois
02) Immersion by Gregory Benford
03) The Dead by Michael Swanwick
04) The Flowers of Aulit Prison by Nancy Kress
05) A Dry, Quiet War by Tony Daniel
06) Thirteen Phantasms by James P. Blaylock
07) Primrose and Thorn by Bud Sparhawk
08) The Miracle of Ivar Avenue by by John Kessel
09) The Last Homosexual by Paul Park
10) Recording Angel by Ian McDonald
11) Death Do Us Part by Robert Silverberg
12) The Spade of Reason by Jim Cowan
13) The Cost to Be Wise by Maureen F. McHugh
14) Bicycle Repairman by Bruce Sterling
15) The Weighing of Ayre by Gregory Feeley
16) The Longer Voyage by Michael Cassutt
17) The Land of Nod by Mike Resnick
18) Red Sonja and Lessingham in Dreamland by Gwyneth Jones
19) The Lady Vanishes by Charles Sheffield
20) Chrysalis by Robert Reed
21) The Wind Over the World by Steven Utley
22) Changes by William Barton
23) Counting Cats in Zanzibar by Gene Wolfe
24) How We Got In Town and Out Again by Jonathan Lethem
25) Dr. Tilmann's Consultant: A Scientific Romance by Cherry Wilder
26) SchrÃƒÂ¶dinger's Dog by Damien Broderick
27) Foreign Devils by Walter Jon Williams
28) In the MSOB by Stephen Baxter
29) The Robot's Twilight Companion by Tony Daniel
30) Honorable Mentions: 1996 by Gardner Dozois

Read by James DeLotel
